019package org.jgrapes.webconsole.examples.consoleapp;
020
021import java.io.IOException;
022import java.io.InputStream;
023import java.net.InetSocketAddress;
024import java.net.URI;
025import java.net.URISyntaxException;
026import java.security.KeyStore;
027import java.security.KeyStoreException;
028import java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException;
029import java.security.SecureRandom;
030import java.security.UnrecoverableKeyException;
031import java.security.cert.CertificateException;
032import java.util.Arrays;
033import java.util.Collections;
034import java.util.Map;
035import javax.net.ssl.KeyManagerFactory;
036import javax.net.ssl.SSLContext;
037import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
038import org.jgrapes.core.ClassChannel;
039import org.jgrapes.core.Component;
040import org.jgrapes.core.Components;
041import org.jgrapes.core.NamedChannel;
042import org.jgrapes.core.events.Stop;
043import org.jgrapes.http.HttpServer;
044import org.jgrapes.http.InMemorySessionManager;
045import org.jgrapes.http.LanguageSelector;
046import org.jgrapes.http.events.Request;
047import org.jgrapes.io.NioDispatcher;
048import org.jgrapes.io.util.PermitsPool;
049import org.jgrapes.net.SslCodec;
050import org.jgrapes.net.TcpServer;
051import org.jgrapes.util.ComponentCollector;
052import org.jgrapes.util.PreferencesStore;
053import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.BrowserLocalBackedKVStore;
054import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.ConletComponentFactory;
055import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.ConsoleWeblet;
056import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.KVStoreBasedConsolePolicy;
057import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.PageResourceProviderFactory;
058import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.WebConsole;
059import org.jgrapes.webconsole.vuejs.VueJsConsoleWeblet;
060import org.osgi.framework.BundleActivator;
061import org.osgi.framework.BundleContext;
062
063/**
064 *
065 */
066public class ConsoleApp extends Component implements BundleActivator {
067
068    private ConsoleApp app;
069
070    /**
071     * Instantiates a new http(s) web console demo.
072     */
073    public ConsoleApp() {
074        super(new ClassChannel() {
075        });
076    }
077
078    /*
079     * (non-Javadoc)
080     * 
081     * @see org.osgi.framework.BundleActivator#start(org.osgi.framework.
082     * BundleContext)
083     */
084    @Override
085    public void start(BundleContext context) throws Exception {
086        // The demo component is the application
087        app = new ConsoleApp();
088        // Attach a general nio dispatcher
089        app.attach(new NioDispatcher());
090
091        // Network level unencrypted channel.
092        Channel httpTransport = new NamedChannel("httpTransport");
093        // Create a TCP server listening on port 8888
094        app.attach(new TcpServer(httpTransport)
095            .setServerAddress(new InetSocketAddress(8888)));
096
097        // Create TLS "converter"
098        KeyStore serverStore = KeyStore.getInstance("JKS");
099        try (InputStream keyFile
100            = ConsoleApp.class.getResourceAsStream("localhost.jks")) {
101            serverStore.load(keyFile, "nopass".toCharArray());
102        }
103        KeyManagerFactory kmf = KeyManagerFactory.getInstance(
104            KeyManagerFactory.getDefaultAlgorithm());
105        kmf.init(serverStore, "nopass".toCharArray());
106        SSLContext sslContext = SSLContext.getInstance("TLS");
107        sslContext.init(kmf.getKeyManagers(), null, new SecureRandom());
108        // Create a TCP server for SSL
109        Channel securedNetwork = app.attach(
110            new TcpServer().setServerAddress(new InetSocketAddress(8889))
111                .setBacklog(3000).setConnectionLimiter(new PermitsPool(50)));
112        app.attach(new SslCodec(httpTransport, securedNetwork, sslContext));
113
114        // Create an HTTP server as converter between transport and application
115        // layer.
116        app.attach(new HttpServer(app.channel(),
117            httpTransport, Request.In.Get.class, Request.In.Post.class));
118
119        // Build application layer
120        app.attach(new PreferencesStore(app.channel(), this.getClass()));
121        app.attach(new InMemorySessionManager(app.channel()));
122        app.attach(new LanguageSelector(app.channel()));
123
124        // Assemble console components
125        createVueJsConsole();
126        Components.start(app);
127    }
128
129    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.TooFewBranchesForASwitchStatement")
130    private void createVueJsConsole() throws URISyntaxException {
131        ConsoleWeblet consoleWeblet
132            = app.attach(new VueJsConsoleWeblet(app.channel(), Channel.SELF,
133                new URI("/")))
134                .prependClassTemplateLoader(this.getClass())
135                .prependResourceBundleProvider(ConsoleApp.class)
136                .prependConsoleResourceProvider(ConsoleApp.class);
137        WebConsole console = consoleWeblet.console();
138        // consoleWeblet.setConsoleSessionInactivityTimeout(300_000);
139        console.attach(new BrowserLocalBackedKVStore(
140            console, consoleWeblet.prefix().getPath()));
141        console.attach(new KVStoreBasedConsolePolicy(console));
142        // Add all available page resource providers
143        console.attach(new ComponentCollector<>(
144            PageResourceProviderFactory.class, console.channel(), type -> {
145                switch (type) {
146                case "org.jgrapes.webconsole.provider.gridstack.GridstackProvider":
147                    return Arrays.asList(
148                        Map.of("requireTouchPunch", true,
149                            "configuration", "CoreWithJQUiPlugin"));
150                default:
151                    return Arrays.asList(Collections.emptyMap());
152                }
153            }));
154        // Add all available conlets
155        console.attach(new ComponentCollector<>(
156            ConletComponentFactory.class, console.channel(), type -> {
157                switch (type) {
158                case "org.jgrapes.webconlet.examples.login.LoginConlet":
159                    return Collections.emptyList();
160                default:
161                    return Arrays.asList(Collections.emptyMap());
162                }
163            }));
164    }
165
166    /*
167     * (non-Javadoc)
168     * 
169     * @see
170     * org.osgi.framework.BundleActivator#stop(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext)
171     */
172    @Override
173    public void stop(BundleContext context) throws Exception {
174        app.fire(new Stop(), Channel.BROADCAST);
175        Components.awaitExhaustion();
176    }
177
178    /**
179     * @param args
180     * @throws IOException
181     * @throws InterruptedException
182     * @throws NoSuchAlgorithmException
183     * @throws KeyStoreException
184     * @throws UnrecoverableKeyException
185     * @throws CertificateException
186     * @throws KeyManagementException
187     */
188    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.SignatureDeclareThrowsException")
189    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
190        new ConsoleApp().start(null);
191    }
192
193}
